'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a location in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
This large underground temple is devoted to [[Berath]] - and is as grisly as the god of death's temple can be expected to be. Devotees and acolytes prepare bodies for burial, while the high priest attends to the rites of worship, preparing to pass his mantle on to someone more worthy - a death godlike, who is the only appropriate priest of Berath in his view.

==Points of interest==
* A straightforward area: Preparation terrace to the left, main chamber with the impressive decorations straight ahead.

==Characters==
* [[High Priest Kasu]]: Starts the quest [[Eulogy for the Dead]].

==Loot==
* You can loot the bodies on the preparation tables for a pair of [[Amulet of Health (Deadfire)|amulets of health]].
* The locked ([[Mechanics|Difficulty]] 7) and trapped ([[Necrotic Lance (Deadfire)|Necrotic Lance Trap]]) chest in the giant serpent skull contains a number of potions and books.
